14:09 <johannesm> Hello, i have a question about installing xwiki using apt-tools. I added the sources and used apt-get install but it always stopps at "Wating for Headers 0%" Any Suggestions ß

Dblist component seems to be restricted to blog items (yeah i know, i'm missing something but what)
